Quickstrike:




Quickstrike gaged at the pain on his body. He was a tattered mess. He tried 
to move, still fearing more shots, but there was not enough strength to pick 
himself up. A shot had hit him at the back of his neck, nearly paralyzing 
him and resitricting him from screaming.

He went still, his eyes wild from the pain. He was still conscious. All that 
was behind his eyes, was the face of the poor mouse. The side of his chest 
was torn open, exposing circitry and mechanical works inside. He struggled 
to breath, then after he went into stasis lock.
